summary: TAKATA INFLATORS - IT HAS BEEN OVER A YEAR SINCE THIS FAMILY WAS NOTIFIED OF THIS OPEN SAFETY ISSUE - WE THANK YOUR OFFICE FOR THE NOTICE.  WHAT PLAN OF ACTION DOES YOUR OFFICE RECOMMEND?  HOW UNSAFE DOES YOUR OFFICE BELIEVE THIS VEHICLE IS TO DRIVE WITH OTHER FAMILY MEMBERS AS PASSENGERS? THANK YOU.  V/R, TOM
